name: dev-session
description: Minimal CLI for isolated parallel development sessions

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/commands/create.ts src/commands/destroy.ts src/commands/list.ts src/commands/claude.ts src/lib/config.ts src/lib/docker.ts src/lib/env.ts src/lib/ports.ts src/lib/worktree.ts --format esm --dts
